code: import React,{useRef,useState}from"react";import Slider from"react-slick";import"slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css";import"slick-carousel/slick/slick.css";import classes from"./Carousel.module.css";import DetailsModal from"./DetailsModal";import Overview from"./Overview";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Carousel(_ref){let{movieList,type}=_ref;const[selectedMovieId,setSelectedMovieId]=useState(null);const[selectedModalType,setSelectedModalType]=useState(null);const dialog=useRef();const settings={dots:false,lazyLoad:true,infinite:movieList.length>5,speed:500,slidesToShow:5,slidesToScroll:1};const getColor=vote=>{if(vote>=8)return"green";else if(vote>=5&&vote<8)return"orange";else return"red";};const openModal=(event,movieId,modalType)=>{event.preventDefault();setSelectedMovieId(movieId);setSelectedModalType(modalType);dialog.current.open();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DetailsModal,{ref:dialog,movieid:selectedMovieId,type:type,modalType:selectedModalType}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes["container-carousel"],children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slider,{...settings,children:movieList.map(movie=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.movie,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500${movie.poster_path}`,alt:"",title:type==="movie"?movie.title:movie.name,className:classes.image}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes["movie-info"],children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:classes.title,children:type==="movie"?movie.title:movie.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:classes[`${getColor(movie.vote_average)}`],children:movie.vote_average.toFixed(1)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Overview,{movie:movie,type:type,onClick:e=>openModal(e,movie.id,"carouselModal")})]},movie.id))})})]});}export default Carousel;
